title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption.

title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his reluctant son.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind bent on chaos.

title: The Godfather Part II
description: The early life and career of Vito Corleone while his son expands the family crime empire.

title: 12 Angry Men
description: A jury deliberates the fate of a defendant in a murder trial.

title: Schindler's List
description: A businessman saves Jewish lives during the Holocaust.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
description: The final battle for Middle-earth begins.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: Stories of crime intertwine in Los Angeles.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: A hobbit begins a journey to destroy a powerful ring.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The life journey of a kind-hearted man with a low IQ.

title: Inception
description: A thief steals information through dream-sharing technology.

title: Fight Club
description: An underground fight club forms as an anti-consumerist movement.

title: The Matrix
description: A hacker discovers the shocking truth about reality.

title: Goodfellas
description: The rise and fall of a mob associate.

title: Interstellar
description: Explorers travel through a wormhole in space.

title: City of God

title: Se7en

description: An FBI trainee seeks help from a cannibalistic serial killer.

description: Soldiers search for a paratrooper behind enemy lines.

description: The Rebels face attacks from the Empire as Luke trains to become a Jedi.

description: The Fellowship is divided but continues the fight against Sauron.

description: A Roman general seeks revenge after betrayal.

description: A young lion prince flees his kingdom after his father's death.

description: A sole survivor tells the story of a mysterious crime lord.

description: An archaeologist races to find the Ark of the Covenant.

description: A freed slave sets out to rescue his wife.

description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter.
